mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart(ca_create_dt, ro_no, co_no) VALUES (now(), #{roNo}, #{coNo})
mapper.select: SELECT ca_no, ro_name, (SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_cart_product tcp WHERE tcp.ca_no = tca.ca_no and tcp.cp_status = 1) AS countProduct, (SELECT SUM(tpr.pr_price) FROM tbl_product tpr LEFT JOIN tbl_sell_product tsp on tpr.pr_no = tsp.pr_no LEFT JOIN tbl_cart_product tcp on tsp.sp_no = tcp.sp_no WHERE tcp.ca_no = tca.ca_no and tcp.cp_status = 1) AS totalPrice FROM tbl_cart tca LEFT JOIN tbl_room tro ON tro.ro_no = tca.ro_no WHERE tca.co_no = #{coNo} and (SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_cart_product tcp WHERE tcp.ca_no = tca.ca_no and tcp.cp_status = 1) > 0 ORDER BY tca.ca_create_dt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_cart_product tcp LEFT JOIN tbl_cart tca ON tca.ca_no = tcp.ca_no SET tcp.cp_status = 0 WHERE tca.ca_no = #{caNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart_product(cp_status, cp_create_dt, ca_no, sp_no) VALUES (#{cpStatus}, now(), #{caNo}, #{spNo})
mapper.select: SELECT tpr.pr_name, tpr.pr_brand, tsp.sp_size, tpr.pr_price, tpr.pr_no, tcp.cp_no, (SELECT tpf.prf_uuid FROM tbl_product_file tpf WHERE tpf.pr_no = tpr.pr_no ORDER BY tpf.prf_status DESC LIMIT 1) AS thumbnail FROM tbl_cart_product tcp LEFT JOIN tbl_sell_product tsp ON tsp.sp_no = tcp.sp_no LEFT JOIN tbl_product tpr ON tpr.pr_no = tsp.pr_no WHERE ca_no = #{caNo} and cp_status = 1 ORDER BY tcp.cp_create_dt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_cart_product SET cp_status = 0 WHERE cp_no = #{cpNo}
mapper.select: SELECT a.cp_status ,a.cp_create_dt ,b.sp_size ,c.pr_name ,c.pr_price ,c.pr_status FROM tbl_cart_product a, tbl_sell_product b, tbl_product c WHERE a.ca_no = #{caNo} AND a.sp_no = b.sp_no AND b.pr_no = c.pr_no
